name: Get Out! (wkndgamedev)
description:
*Work in Progress*

You must find the key to Get Out!

“Get Out!” is my first game and was made over the past 2 weeks while learning Construct 3. I am still working on new levels and features. This is not a complete project; it’s just me getting my feet wet in game dev. Let me know what you think! Thanks for playing.

Keyboard Controls:

·   Move: Left/Right Arrow Keys

·   Jump: Up Arrow Key

·   Shoot: Spacebar

Touch Controls:

·   Move, Jump, Shoot: On screen controls

Art: @TD2TL & @nyk_nck
